trans-unit.source: Represents a serializable collection of service metadata in XML form.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> class contains a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects, each of which contains one dialect of metadata in XML form.

Typically, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> class is used to pass a group of XML metadata documents to and from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> objects, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.

To create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

To obtain a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> property.

In addition, you can use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A> method to load a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from XML data and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> method to write the internal metadata to an XML format.
This type implements the structure defined in the WS-MetadataExchange specification.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class.
Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class that contains the specified collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects.
Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from `sections`.
The metadata values that the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> is to contain.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> from the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> object.
Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
The reader to read in XML.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> that contains all the metadata present in the XML stream.
The reader is `null`.
Writes the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> to XML using the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.
Writes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> to an XML stream.
The writer to use to write the XML.
The writer is `null`.
Implements <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema"></xref> method to provide serialization support.
Returns <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref>.

Returns the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> object that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System#Xml#Serialization#IXmlSerializable#WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)"></xref> method and accessed by the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System#Xml#Serialization#IXmlSerializable#ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)"></xref> method.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)"></xref> method to support deserialization from XML.
The reader to use when reading XML.
The reader is `null`.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)"></xref> method to support serialization to XML.
The writer to use when writing XML.
The writer is `null`.
